要.notes: civilian woman brings much-needed power cell

審.notes: crested-helmeted ranking investigator at military hearing has mission waypoints all stored in his brain

既.notes: ceramite battle-sister statue stands atop long-established convent

被.notes: daemonic entities fashion hide from warp rift energies to cover/conceal themselves

軍.notes: car combined with helm is basic military vehicle

害.notes: commander hides grinweed between helmet and bodyguard, secret harm

我.notes: just a one-handed weapon and a marksman's honour

思.notes: feeling arises simply from brain and heart together

議.notes: word next to khorne (aggressive) over ego

写.notes: reproduction helm conceals needle pistol with secret layer

真.notes: tech-priest's laser eye verifies mechanicus credentials of authentic anvil

息.notes: breath as the essence of vital self (self and heart)

映.notes: sun literally, central authority figuratively illuminates

期.notes: cogitator and moon used together to precisely measure time

待.notes: column pauses at temple to be blessed on way to construction site

搭.notes: with pistol and flowers during conjunction, boarding neutral ship for meeting

乗.notes: blessed reactor being donned by man

形.notes: two-handed sword schematic describes manufacture and use

元.notes: the emperor and malcador, two unaugmented humans

新.notes: new house guard gets taser and loaf of bread

型.notes: power sword dual-wielding planet-side-only specialist is martial archetype

化.notes: marneus calgar uses auspex to remake the galaxy

発.notes: command tent, leaving with two-handed weapon combined with unaugmented legs

紹.notes: thread represents binding of sword (hireling) and employer (unaugmented person)

介.notes: refractor-warded special vessel for care of gestating primarch

異.notes: the notional brain of common citizenry is afflicted by dissent

注.notes: customised counterseptic for leader is accompanied by physician's note

意.notes: collision alert tone affects heart rate

表.notes: doubt-filled knightly aspirant projects a bold appearance

状.notes: tyranid and hound trapped in stasis for study

起.notes: while running the tech-priest's mechadendrite can still independently make things happen

走.notes: righteous citizen runs on receiving beam of light vision

伏.notes: Guilliman's 'hound' bows on returning from a mission

判.notes: when half-finished a power sword (note curve in blade) is stamped on the tang

構.notes: trees surrounding the academy and trained into shapes that teach martial arts

組.notes: thread implies connection, data stack to store team registration

印.notes: data slate with purity seal carries trademark-endorsed files

機.notes: made from tree, combines double threads, marksman's honour for precision and human operator

首.notes: chaos gifts bestowed on chaos leader: horns and heretical augmented eye

付.notes: Guilliman can seize victory with even a speck of luck

外.notes: if you're going outside in the evening, you need at least a force staff

装.notes: regalia for gentleman who faces tyranid (tyrannic veteran)

前.notes: former times (old night) is horned heretic lunatic with power sword

部.notes: special projects division brew elixirs in dedicated sensor spire

風.notes: (plague) wind is vessel for nurgle swarm

防.notes: Protection of fortress spire that overlooks the approaches (ways)

体.notes: guilliman is the book from which the physiques of the ultramarines are written

処.notes: an area is patrolled only by a tank and the wind

理.notes: king plus li as figurative distance he controls is rational

塗.notes: 'painting' weird auxiliaries with counterseptic on an earth parade ground

嬉.notes: woman drumming on laundry, happy because nothing to do with war

可.notes: a really big xenos leaf unexpectedly provides acceptable protection to unarmoured man

何.notes: superbly trained ultramarines find uncertainty acceptable

荷.notes: carrier bag with uncertain contents draped with tourist's local flower necklace

配.notes: ranks of reagent bottles arranged by dedicated mechadendrite

時.notes: sun temple is where standard local hour length is officially ordained

予.notes: study gene-print of hook-leafed flora as early preparation for establishing colony

定.notes: commander filled with rectitude is as certain as anything can be

設.notes: at a word, mechanicus missiles are launched to build structures

寄.notes: big man in crested helm accepts your credentials, so you can approach

模.notes: printing blocks (to print holy books) are carved of trees from holy sepulchres

取.notes: thing appropriated by means of oratorical and sexual persuasion

扱.notes: hand weapon infallibly handled by means of sorcerous link

店.notes: unarmoured civilian in hab cell nevertheless has force staff to trade

約.notes: single thread stained with ensorcelled blood drop provides approximate information on target

格.notes: logical tree enumerating status of each thing

消.notes: counterseptic eliminates pathogen on moon base with lit biohazard beacon

費.notes: spend throne and get seashell coin as change

税.notes: tax on promethium pays for anti-mandrake reserves

掲.notes: bulletin warns of heretic carrying hand weapon at penitential festival

載.notes: chaplain's car has dedicated pedestal for him to stand on and orate from

場.notes: this place is the earth won by the guardsman to be his retirement fund.

受.notes: Hive despot receives visitors guarded by disconcerting dual lightning-claw concubine

劇.notes: Allegorical play involving fighting grox dressed as carnosaur with power sword

逃.notes: Desperate criminals escape leaving trillions on road

届.notes: Notification consists of chapter banner credential and reason

詳.notes: Detail-focussed commander even has a word on the disposition of sheep

細.notes: Thread under brain influence is made finer, thinner

指.notes: Holding an auspex in one hand on a transparent deck, the sun below, operating touchscreen with one finger

能.notes: Competent naval rating with augmetic arm on moon surface wields two auspexes

属.notes: Beneath a chapter banner, a swarming xenos species rising from a catacomb

座.notes: Seats for workers in micro-manufactorum in hab, set on bare earth

運.notes: With the military dispatched (on road) the rest is now up to fortune

現.notes: What the king can currently personally see

術.notes: Whole column artfully sliced by wraithblade, heretical leaf is figurative eldar

楽.notes: Confort-giving white berries on tree, that give tingling sensation

信.notes: Believe in Guilliman's word (the codex) above all

決.notes: Assassin marks decision to proceed by cleaning his weapons with counterseptic

周.notes: hollowed out moon debris field is orbited by sealed Word Bearers flask

年.notes: A service rotation on a starport is one year

度.notes: First degree of Calth arcology development is attained when populace can reproduce

作.notes: The ultramarines do their work with a chainsword

編.notes: Every issue of a heretical edition is bound in sanctified thread, stored behind a shutter behind which is a locked gate

歌.notes: someone doubly accepting their lacking condition sings

行.notes: A line of eldar text on a column

動.notes: If you have extra armor but you also have power you can move

仲.notes: Guilliman's centre is his relationship with those he leads

間.notes: For an interval while the sun's influence is felt inside a webway gate, it is safe to pass

規.notes: What husbands are allowed to see is strictly regulated

造.notes: Word Bearers preacher invents lie as he declares it on the road with his followers

司.notes: Administratum bureacrat is unnoticed minor heretic

告.notes: Beastman standing over broken civilian declares his loyalty

屈.notes: Marines yield the field, departing in good order under banner

巻.notes: Volumes of packaged daemonic incursion held in an archivist's holy mechadendrite

特.notes: Temple dedicated to cattle stands out amongst the many more conventional temples

限.notes: Fortress spire etched with silver is a limit to daemons

第.notes: Manufactorum workers get paid local cash in sequentially numbered envelopes

売.notes: Gentleman recruit sells things on the black market

数.notes: The numeric quantity of grains of rice a woman ate only chaos (Tzeentch) can tell

録.notes: Record laid down on metal, extracted with thread of excruciation

像.notes: Plainly fraudulent heroic image of Guilliman with an elephant

公.notes: Augmetic legs removed and augmetic arm too, put on display for complete public scrutiny

演.notes: Chaos commander performs undercover, given a spritz of counterseptic to temporarily hide corruption

寅.notes: Chaos commander fleshcrafted into tiger, filled with heretical purpose and augmetics (legs)

性.notes: Pure attitude makes clear gender distinctions

光.notes: Heretics transmuted by xenos technology into beacons walking on unaugmented legs

達.notes: Travelling on road together is easier to be lucky. Collectivity is reinforced by extra lucky stroke.

空.notes: Inspired recruit works with airy lightness

描.notes: Drawing with one hand, only flower on mind

絶.notes: An extremely powerful artifact, full blessed with both holy thread and color

対.notes: Thesis (fully formed sentence) and antithesis (speck of an idea)

零.notes: Moment zero in conception, clean rain and life beginning below

命.notes: Life matchlessly protected by technology (conversion field) and faith (purity seal)

源.notes: Some hive-stack springs are just filthy waste water but counterseptic indicates clean

是.notes: Sun shining upon deserving rectitude is justice

供.notes: Guilliman's companions are (and appear) common by necessity

隊.notes: A party of adventurers assemble in the shadow of a fortress spire to hunt a horned grox

紅.notes: Ancient red (old Mars) is thread of industry stretching back to antiquity

点.notes: Psyker marks target point with little motes of plasma

姿.notes: Woman undergoing juvenat treatments will next have an attractive figure (but be the same mentally)

順.notes: River of fated events ordained in page of Tzeentch's book

次.notes: Hoarfrost forms; next thing to be dealt with psychically is whatever happens to be lacking

賞.notes: Bunker taken out, prize is medal (coin)

員.notes: Unarmoured man has special seashell membership coin

先.notes: Advance group consists of beastman running ahead on their organic legs

兵.notes: Properly armored soldier looks like a walking hill on two augmetic legs

浜.notes: Salty seaspray tastes a bit like counterseptic to soldier on shore

挿.notes: With one hand inserting components into extra armored tank with one side (axle and armor) off.

込.notes: Those who meet the regiment in transit are included in the ranks

客.notes: Guests are distinguished, each wears crested helm

応.notes: In a secluded hab, conspirators affirm their heartfelt loyalty

援.notes: Fighting one-handed, your death-cultist ally comes to reinforce you

販.notes: Commercial types working with low-denomination coins and opposing one another

始.notes: Woman with specialised augmetic arm lays out plain bodyglove to begin working on it

種.notes: Fuel type and armor type are vehicle class specification

類.notes: Rice on big plant on left, reference book page on right describing variety

通.notes: Even when travelling the things he uses are all expensive gene-print coded

常.notes: Peerpetual fought under the banner long since entombed under the bunker

樹.notes: Tree plantation dedicated to drum production where only a speck of pesticide is allowed

脂.notes: Fat ship's captain nicknamed 'moon' reviewing auspex looking down at sun below

持.notes: Outside temple with hand weapon, you can't enter and your opponent can't leave

徴.notes: Underhive lord's emblem - broken column, the king himself under the mountain, continuous tracks for conveyer

催.notes: Guilliman hosts entertainment function in aquila hall under hollowed-out mountain

織.notes: Thread woven into rich brocade like a visual clarion to accompany ceremonial guard

登.notes: Special command tent for mountain ascents packs down into the size of a large bean

話.notes: Word spun by tongue into story

撃.notes: Car with one-shot rocket launcher, over the hand that fires it

着.notes: Bulk transport full of wool arrives and is registered on dockyard scanner (eye)

需.notes: Rain ruining circuit board represents demand arising from attrition

準.notes: Associates of heretics are subject to cleansing (counterseptic, aquila) and scanning (ray)

納.notes: Thread of rappelling line dangling into interior of devastated hive, supplying essentials

複.notes: Warp rift and mechanicum vortex mutually reinforce each other

企.notes: Refractor field masking a stasis field generator as part of a cunning scheme

庫.notes: Hab cell big enough to store a car in is a de facto warehouse

賭.notes: Gambling chits (coins) used by prominent citizens when they gamble

週.notes: Travellers spend a week on the orbit road before being allowed to leave the system

集.notes: Aquila over rogue trader's family tree, all members of whom contribute to collection

愛.notes: Affection is evidence of heart inside monstrous warrior with lightning claws and continuous tracks

汎.notes: Universal counterseptic dispersal via droplets in wind

社.notes: Shrine is basically altar dedicated to earth

具.notes: All mechanicus tools have eyes that only ever get to look at anvils

閉.notes: With talented soldier holding door, it might as well be closed.

利.notes: Fighting next to promethium tank, fighter with power sword that can rupture tanks has advantage

団.notes: Special team all wear bodygloves marked with symbolic speck of blood+

出.notes: A mountain-shaped necron fortress emerges from a geological mountain

望.notes: Desire is death (of self), tidal (lunar) attraction, rules (king) over all

願.notes: Standing on a blasted plain, reading prayers from a page

語.notes: Word accorded official status by five-member unarmored council

肩.notes: Tau giant shoulder pad looks like a shutter with a moon on it

胸.notes: Special torso units of dark mechanicum robots have lunar alloys and ensorcelled misfortune for power

蓋.notes: Hatch is insignia (flowers) over bygone technology over what's basically a dish

連.notes: Consecutive is rush-hour cars on the road

銃.notes: Golden heirloom rifle accompanied by ranged veteran who doesn't move much and still has organic legs

武.notes: Martial (as distinct from civilian) magazines that custodes use are marked with 'stop' for man-stopper

質.notes: The quality mark is two loaves signifying consistency and a coin for the money-backed guarantee

高.notes: Hive nobility - iron-halo unarmored on top of catacomb full of unarmored

閃.notes: Man entering warded mechanicus gate is annihilated in a brief flash

名.notes: Socialites evening bodygloves proclaim their house names

駆.notes: Powerful engine logo is horse that can cross a segmentum

繰.notes: Thread of tradition next to merchant family tree repeating their roles down the generations

神.notes: God represented by an altar to the Old Ones who made the Jokaero

交.notes: Iron hands iron father surges with alternating current

専.notes: Sanctioned heretical reason (savant) focussed on speck of lore

使.notes: Alpha legion messenger carries heretical chronicle under ultramarines colors

変.notes: Tzeentechi dark mechanicus mutagen-spraying combat servitor

題.notes: Justice (as overall theme) wraps written page

呼.notes: Unarmored next to voice-levelling microphone with hook to hold it by

迅.notes: Holographic (ray) administratum apparatus on road is uncharacteristically hasty for administratum

速.notes: Bundle of radioactive fuel rods are the last word in fast road transport

増.notes: Earth output increases under influence of horns (nature), farmer's brain and natural resources (sun)

栄.notes: The tree of the scholam's former students is the substance of its honour

飾.notes: Artificer-worked ceramite shoulder pad clutches banner with turret ornament on top

凄.notes: Psychic (hoarfrost) and mechanicus (augmetic hand) combine to weave woman in amazing feat

谷.notes: like a gully but deep enough that you can shield it with a refractor field

容.notes: Crested helm tossed into valley to give appearance of casualty

役.notes: Anti-structure missile is tailored for a specific role

更.notes: Thinking of something absurd (Heretical biased jokaero with correction) to stay awake during night watch

購.notes: Purchasing small seashell-coin-value items in bulk for whole academy

絵.notes: A picture is painted to tie attendees of meeting with symbolic thread

柄.notes: Mundane wood on haft wraps heretical interior core of disguised weapon

舗.notes: Word Bearers depot contains troops blood samples in warded flasks, plus and old IG dog tags

頂.notes: Single leaf retrieved from summit of mountain, attached to page in codex

机.notes: Sitting at wooden desk in classroom with fresh wind blowing in through open window

陣.notes: Temporary fortress tower set up to watch over vehicle

書.notes: Reports are made by the remembrancers, whose symbol is  a stylus over Sol

例.notes: Guilliman slices impervious xenos bone with power sword to make example

念.notes: The current moment of the heart is notion after notion

招.notes: One-handed weapon proffered as invitation to professional (knife) and amateur (unarmored) would-be assassins

軽.notes: Car feels deceptively lightweight to the driver influenced by amasec

奢.notes: Prominent imperial citizen (with dot) proclaims his significance with an extravagant big display held over his head

河.notes: Hygiene (counterseptic) level acceptable sufficiently fast-flowing river

会.notes: Conversion field active over fortress wall, behind which meeting takes place

輝.notes: An army of lights sparkles in the darkness

守.notes: Commander watches over battlezone, specks on hololith

焼.notes: fire attended by chef is for roasting

護.notes: Word of the emperor borne by sister of silence - wreath on head, aquila on breast, genitals

精.notes: sprite combines abundance of rice with blue-green of chlorophyll

青.notes: doubtful moon image captured on unreliable hardware flickers blue-green

鋭.notes: the unearthly sharpness of mandrake weapons glint gold in the darkness

遺.notes: bleeding to death on road, man bequeaths both credit card and coins to accompanying son

伝.notes: Guilliman's biography is a cloud of great deeds

操.notes: the chastity of the merchant family line is preserved with hand weapons

超.notes: superhuman combines strengths of both fighters and civilians with great speed (run)

比.notes: two auspexes together allow measurement of ratios

渡.notes: rinsed in counterseptic for every trip, ferry is ship of least degree

彼.notes: intimidating other man standing apart by broken column, wrapped in hide

器.notes: four bodygloves stitched together to make a large capacity thing to contain big

牢.notes: prison governor is commander of inmates he sees as cattle

無.notes: defense laser (turret on vault on plasma) reduces all targets to nothing

剣.notes: inquisitor conducts inspection with obvious power sword

拝.notes: hand weapon next to heretical grinweed

歴.notes: history of hive world's verdan past preserved in hab block, grove in stasis field

怖.notes: terror troops' attitude runs to carrying cloth (actually flayed skin) at waist

恐.notes: fear: industry and scent of blood on wind lies upon heart

死.notes: (bone) auspex of legion of the damned detects only death

挑.notes: with only one hand weapon nevertheless challenge billions

整.notes: bundled chaos undivided pulled together over correctness

流.notes: veteran stands over fast-flowing chemical river, moistened by rising spray

域.notes: region is arbitrary quantity of earth

苦.notes: flowers are useless balm for distress of the old

道.notes: notional path is road walked by organisational head (neck)

貯.notes: coin to store something wrapped in preservative 'leader leaves' (certificates)

或.notes: unarmored scout is minimum/arbitrary notional soldier

帝.notes: pope has crown with reliquary (vase) on top over his personal banner

続.notes: use is continued: thread of usage prolonged by sale to new owner

脅.notes: overwhelming fleet of three powers holding station over moon, threatening

崩.notes: figurative mountain pulled apart over two moons (and their gravity)

屯.notes: preacher's presence is telltale sign of area designated for stationing of troops

端.notes: vase is apex of xenos computer - mountain build of/over circuit boards

素.notes: doubt woven into thread of science by definition of irreducible elements

然.notes: perverse parody of nature: double night to make hound over plasma flames

帰.notes: power sword in hand, augmetic arm honour guard returns

布.notes: scrap of banner at waist is now only cloth

市.notes: every city-state is big enough to have a banner with a crown

統.notes: lineage is thread (so passed on from one to one) of talented ranged veterans

負.notes: a loss is represented as chain on coin itself

徹.notes: cadian veterans training on moon between necron pylons and chaos, are thorough

解.notes: chained broken purpose is resolved with knife-cattle sacrifice

弾.notes: bullet is bow but simplest projectile

革.notes: squad from same hive gang bind middles with leather but leave legs free (line)

勝.notes: with lunar influence and daemonic incursion feeding power, inevitable win

範.notes: input controls over associated car and scroll declaring permitted input range

波.notes: think of the ocean as fenris's hide, shaking loose spray

初.notes: first warp rift was created with ritual knife

聖.notes: holy person hears divine message and is unarmoured; is even over king

軌.notes: car can be assigned number nine when assigned a specific course

替.notes: two husbands of matriarchs meet in orbit over sun to transact financial exchange

揚.notes: retirement fund exists to hoist those who only have one hand weapon left

復.notes: broken column is rebuilt and vortex in xenos temple is restored

後.notes: monofilament tripwire on column defeats continuous tracks after initial engagement

緑.notes: woven thread and threat of excruciation

尾.notes: Space Wolves chapter banner has wolf tails (hair/fur?) hanging from it

迎.notes: concealed combat knife and purity seal for protection when receiving diplomat out on road

亜.notes: power sub-cell is like battery but with terminals on bottom as well

独.notes: hound (hunting) insect is solitary, distinct from social insects

追.notes: planetary governer chases real holders of power out onto road

返.notes: Having left, confronted on road and forced to give back stolen thing

備.notes: Ultramarine flower-designated hive stacks are dedicated spares usage

宇.notes: crested helm is marine, dry is the vacuum that is their realm

宙.notes: crested helm is marine, expanse is their reason for being

功.notes: industry of power is ultimately only concerned with spoils

突.notes: leader recruit's unschooled responses to big things are abrupt

伎.notes: guilliman alone considers theatre a useful branch of endeavour

怪.notes: an attitude softened by amasec abuse leaves one open to seeing ghosts

肢.notes: lunar influence prompts growth of branches (limbs)

任.notes: guilliman entrusts even servitors with important tasks

侵.notes: guilliman has right to intrude on Magos Biologis sanctioned breeding programme

務.notes: obliged by duty, cadians prepare in advance of chaos invasion

衛.notes: for security's sake navigator hides in ruins

直.notes: an organic eye needs both a laser and a square to make something straight

置.notes: an augmetic eye sees straight lines overlaid and correctly places things effortlessly

値.notes: In Guilliman's straightened world everything in effect is assigned a price

植.notes: normal plants are straight (genetically unpolluted) trees

択.notes: fighting with hand weapons, a foot of distance between opponents opens up options

柱.notes: only leader trees are tall enough to be columns

強.notes: armed with only a bow an augmetic arm defeats opponents like insects

教.notes: cognitae savant over child inculcates chaos

勇.notes: geneprinted men are all bred for courage

報.notes: troops' news is a careful mix of good fortune, purity (seal) and sex

略.notes: brain multi-tasking sketches plan for each item

関.notes: chaos idol installed in gate establishes connection to distant place

策.notes: mechanicus countermeasure package is input fields over asset set (modified bundle)

効.notes: continually oscillating power is unusually effective against shields

拾.notes: going about gathering (unifying) things with your hand

合.notes: conversion field protects meeting of unarmored participants in union

移.notes: in the darkness of Old Night, humans were reduced to migrating promethium scavengers

雑.notes: multitudinous (nine) family if miscellanous people united by aquila

蛮.notes: mutagen engineered to produce savagery reduces victims to insects

潜.notes: accountant spritzes interface plugs with counterseptic before diving into financial exchange

闇.notes: beyond the gate into darkness only sound can be perceived

多.notes: old night is full of many terrors

進.notes: preheresy road of progress under aquila

従.notes: an accursed alien column imposes horned obedience on otherwise rectitude

蔵.notes: under rain of flowers parade of retainers carry plunder back to stores

訓.notes: soldiers training in river listening to words yelled by sergeant

須.notes: following schematic pages is obligatory for true mechanicus

雇.notes: shutter of landing craft shades aquila hiring mercenaries beneath

脳.notes: taxed by lunar influence, worried man sweats over misfortune

純.notes: preacher's unadulterated brandy is sealed with red thread

治.notes: counterseptic, and augmetic arm mending clothing- two kinds of cure

泥.notes: trudging through mud, chapter banner high, auspex in hand, constant counterseptic

政.notes: government exists to apply correction to otherwise chaos-prone populace

携.notes: all hand-carried weapons includes aquila-stamped contract of ownership

粋.notes: rice scanned by nine different rays for the most refined palates

唱.notes: electromagnetic chorus of twinned suns fall on unarmored mystic

刃.notes: knife with overlaid line to suggest cut of edge

認.notes: word of formal approval of use of phase edge that cuts heart

苛.notes: flowers are acceptable so spamming them is a technically legal harassment method

総.notes: general material covers common threads, public information, general impressions (heart)

界.notes: care of chaos god's realm is totally subordinated to that god's mind

経.notes: thread of weathered taxing experiences soothed by amasec

幹.notes: mist next to refractor field over dry

迫.notes: unit of cadians under attack on road, being bled white

換.notes: quartermaster exchanges hand weapons, constrained to like FOUR like, from his big inventory

脚.notes: skitarii all have flesh legs replaced bygone technology, marked with forge world glyph

担.notes: hand weapons must be secured as ship crosses into solar storm

験.notes: disguised inquisitor on horse tests planetary defenses in person

式.notes: keystone of bolter round industry is sacred formula

試.notes: at exam students must recite formulae in words

故.notes: old chaos residue marks site of incident

否.notes: unarmored civilian's rights totally negated by noospheric 'not'

接.notes: with one hand pour vase of liquid over woman to join her to cult

剤.notes: chemical compound is prepared by stirring unguent with powered stirring blades

節.notes: logical sections of book separated by ceramite ultima symbol, input fields to choose

危.notes: quarantined (chained) hive stack contains hazards unleashed from scroll

険.notes: inquisitor aware of hidden risk stalks shadow of fortress spire

捨.notes: word bearers one-handedly discard flasks of loyalist gene-seed

施.notes: each pilgrim has grenade-shaped incense dispenser

量.notes: amount of time condemned has to repent is sunrise to 1km

締.notes: pope binds daemons with holy thread

穫.notes: planetary tithe (harvest) in promethium and manpower (laurel, aquila, fertility)

控.notes: sky martial artist voluntarily restrains self from hand weapons

留.notes: assassin with execution warrant and weapon on mind remains unceasingly focussed

脱.notes: under dim moonlight a mandrake begins to shed its solid form

傷.notes: guilliman takes but a wound from a plasma turret and guardsman all together

匠.notes: craft represented by an enclave of bakery

温.notes: tissue culture dish kept carefully warm under counterseptic and sunlight

昔.notes: sol (wreath over sun) is a reference to mankind's legendary past

照.notes: private meeting suddenly illuminated by sunlight and light from plasma weaponry

暖.notes: the conditioned warmth that death cultists all feel for those associated with Sol

旧.notes: antiquated sun has shrunk from initial size marked on side

焔.notes: a great blaze of quarantined (bound) antiquities

篤.notes: heat of great biological activity (like horse)

憎.notes: attitude of hate-filled chaos engine is feral machine spirit over heat of sun

必.notes: geas is heart with suspended wound laid across it

密.notes: esoteric studies for leaders under geas studied on mountain

針.notes: A needle like a gleaming ray of metal

背.notes: north - top of head, flesh character that looks like vertebrae

皆.notes: in north spectrum of combat forces (everyone) come together to defend polar fortress

頼.notes: formal request is bundled pages of bureacratic approval

在.notes: daemon on solid earth exists, for the present anyway

射.notes: great fleshy body of tyranid ship shoots out specks

裏.notes: reverse side of Templar's glory is the kilometre of enemies between tabard and iron halo

如.notes: woman buys a second bodyglove like the first she already has, just in case

違.notes: wrong - navigators don't walk on roads

雄.notes: bull combat servitor has stowed augmetic arm and giant aquila tattoo

狡.notes: hound with alternating tactical circuit is cunning

敵.notes: shop selling chaos-touched dolls is only visible sign of enemy

述.notes: warlock thrusts tip of witchblade into road and bluntly states eldar position

騎.notes: cavalry are horses that take the field where big units are acceptable

階.notes: fortress spire type is down to floor ratio and spectrum of varieties

戒.notes: by adhering to strictures (vessel with level marked) marksman's honor is acquired

偉.notes: guilliman's personal navigator is one of the most eminent of his kind

胞.notes: Fabius Bile crafts cells with lunar influence and possessed mechadendrites

榴.notes: after detonation of explosive shell only trees remain

標.notes: signpost is tree with illuminated sign

章.notes: vase insignia has history stretching back to early imperium

選.notes: enginseer selects from common parts stores with two mechadendrites on road

渾.notes: vaccine (counterseptic) is administered to whole entity of military force

情.notes: ardor an attitude of green youthful vigor

管.notes: control panel, terminator helm left by genestealer, resolve by venting

闘.notes: combat between bloodthirster (bean) and champion (speck) in eternity gate

唯.notes: malcador the unarmored aquila, lon/sole figure holding the golden throne

測.notes: counterseptic is measured out according to rules

則.notes: rules govern the disposition of everything from single coins to power swords

側.notes: most of guilliman's rules are about sides/flanks

執.notes: good luck and an encompassing (round) plan hence execution

徐.notes: cautious auxiliaries gradually appear from cover in broken column

争.notes: chained 40k logo thunder hammer is symbol of eternal conflict

観.notes: when you see a dreadnought you see the ouside appearance and not the hero within

将.notes: Imperial Guard general is tyranid-fighting speck but with lightning claw

顧.notes: imperial advisor is unofficial (under shutter) aquila quoting from page

嵐.notes: storm is wind that undermines mountain

踏.notes: step onto webway, street that shimmers like water, shines like sun

盟.notes: bright engines of allies permitted to dock at orbital plate

阻.notes: access to fortress spire data stacks is comprehensively blocked

胴.notes: on Titan (moon) thousands of barrels of aonymous heretics in identical barrels

筋.notes: artificial muscle: fields to enter commands, inexorable tidal power

砕.notes: stone crushed by mechanicum breaker with multitudinous lascutter rays

継.notes: threads are datalink coupling for rice-carrying forklift

砲.notes: weird xenos stone cannon is nevertheless activated by possessed mechadendrite

仮.notes: guilliman tolerates government he opposes because it's provisional

深.notes: marine aspirant (recruit) rides log through spray in deep ravine

微.notes: single walking plague victim is infinitesimal corruption in underhive

妙.notes: otherworldly woman manifests from a mere few artifacts

床.notes: in a hab cell, a wooden floor

加.notes: power lets you add additional (albeit unarmored) troops

烈.notes: intense skitarii bone-cutting power sword flickers with plasma jets

局.notes: banner over bureau set up in catacomb with unarmored bureaucrats inside

腕.notes: under the moonlight a commander with a primer under his arm

誰.notes: arbites, the word of the aquila, have the right to know who everyone is

敬.notes: possessed unarmoured citizen dressed with flowers in ritual to honor chaos

酷.notes: beastman declaring primacy under influence of liquor is simmply pitiless

緩.notes: death cultist counts ritual threads to alleviate nightmares

漂.notes: sparks spraying out of illuminated sign drift lazily down to the ground

包.notes: possessed mechadendrites autonomously grab and wrap up enemies

稀.notes: engine running on diluted promethium is seldom reliable

簡.notes: a simple machine with just one input field to set interval

差.notes: tending sheep and industry are fundamentally different ways to make things

論.notes: words of dangerous theorising behind a conversion field and a locked gate

補.notes: a supplementary warp rift specialist because they tend to burn out

灰.notes: hive burnt out entirely contains nothing but ash

縁.notes: electric fence (thread) is border between farm equipment (augmetic arms) and grox

膚.notes: carnosaur stomach is used for skin grafts (oddly enough)

胃.notes: stomach is lunar influence subverting brain

糾.notes: entangled by threads of donations from shady organisations

刊.notes: revised edition corrects error, clarifies that power swords need to be kept dry

築.notes: input parameters and smoky industry buildings are constructed over trees.

陥.notes: fortress spire full of proscribed antiquities is trap for Tzeentchian cult

改.notes: mechadendrite infused with chaos remakes infernal machine thought destroyed

隠.notes: hidden mechanicus engine looks like fortress spire, has lightning claw, augmetic arm, giveaway heartbeat

輪.notes: cars do loops in proving ground at research facility

威.notes: corrupt cleric regularly parades captured 'heretic' women to burnish his martial prestige

建.notes: for buildings in alleys builders mark with brushes and build with carpentry

健.notes: Guilliman directs the construction of carpentry buildings for their wholesome qualities

泣.notes: the tears of Sanguinius, symbolically Scarried in vases by every Blood Angel

資.notes: contribution-hungry clerics always looking to the next coin

抗.notes: necron lord has hand-held anti-Whirlwind scrambler

府.notes: there is luck in every hab cell of a well-governed province

転.notes: looking through the windshield of the car watching cyclonic clouds rotate ominously

紛.notes: disputes about how surveyors boundary threads should divide into parts

症.notes: a disease is an illness correctly satisfying the diagnostic criteria

殊.notes: notable bones in am Ordo Xenos collection are vermilion clearance

展.notes: honoured (chapter banner, flowers - doge) dark angel's hooded robe extends to completely conceal

積.notes: promethium coin doubt is a function of volume measurement problems

騙.notes: horse at blast door to deceive those inside that the person riding is unsophisticated

耐.notes: special circuit boards doped with speck of something as proofing against something else

適.notes: antique stores situated the main road at least have to conform to the law

列.notes: a silet column of null maidens all bearing bone-slicing power greatswords

桁.notes: a reinforcing beam made of wood with a line of sanctifying text along it

求.notes: Slaaneshi augmented appetite-producing ray/probe induces pleasant tingling in subjects

球.notes: palantir is sphere that shwows king everything he wants

疑.notes: seeker(auspex)-arrow evaded by doubt generated by fraudulent geneprint masking degeneracy

獲.notes: masses entranced by propaganda encircled by hounds, captured in numbers

菌.notes: bodyglove infested with spores sprouts blooms is saturated with promethium

誘.notes: lure trader into heresy with words about promethium ownership contract

噴.notes: unarmored knife-throwing coin-seeking mercenary produces sprays of liquid whenever he works

脆.notes: flesh is fragile in the face of hazards

緯.notes: navigator marks significant latitudes with paint-soaked thread

播.notes: agricultural servitor sow seed with one hand, seed waypoints written into brain

併.notes: Guilliman combines the heirloom weapons of conquered cultures into an armory

済.notes: a vendetta is finally settled with a sprayed bespoke toxin

翼.notes: wings in pairs over dissenting air currents

断.notes: the judge considers the forklift-load of rice and delivers the loaf of final judgement

抵.notes: insurgents with only hand weapons leave calling cards after attacks, continue to resist

覆.notes: necron column restores vortex, battery comes online, whole complex is covered with forcefield

委.notes: female promethium-trader caste members all receive hereditary trading commission

希.notes: strife over cloth dilutes the imperium's strength and focus

契.notes: Oll Persson filled with doubt, knife in hand, skipping over big events, embodies destiny

軟.notes: civilian car of troops racing to soft spot in defences

隙.notes: in a fortress tower, a reactor with small vents above and below is a gap in defenses

采.notes: fighting a lightning claw on a beam is dicey

採.notes: a sample of unfortunate prisoners are selected at knifepoint with a die

究.notes: officer recruit appointed over multitudes depends on research (rather than experience)

活.notes: sprayed with holy water, withered tongue becomes active, prophesises

導.notes: a guide builds a safe path from specks

路.notes: a route specifically lists each street to be traversed

歯.notes: scheme using bulk transport of rice as bait to obtain rare animal tooth

噛.notes: civilians' teeth are weak; they have to chew

泉.notes: frothing white water emerging from spring

腺.notes: tyranid venom gland is spring made of flesh

撹.notes: sight of ancient hand weapon stirs memories of Oll Persson

覚.notes: observation scholam teaches memory of everything seen

硬.notes: the impossibly hard Necron stone that the inquisition maintains perpetual night watch over

旋.notes: degenerate pilgrimages revolve mindlessly around accursed objects of veneration

螺.notes: psychneuin are insects that create characteristic spiral tracks in psyker brains

修.notes: guilliman augmented can repair chaos-warped schematics

到.notes: attacking a trench line with a power sword, you're ok once you reach it

倒.notes: an enemy guilliman reaches is overthrown

律.notes: laws are pillars made by writing-brushes

途.notes: nomadic auxiliaries are always on a journey in progress

圧.notes: hive stack exerts enormous pressure on the earth it stands on

探.notes: space marine aspirant armed with traditional single hand weapon, searching for trophy kill

眺.notes: the emperor's eye gazes across the billions that make up the imperium

広.notes: men with augmetic arms live in wider hab cells

拡.notes: intervene directly with hand weapon to make wider

遠.notes: chapter serf on road in distant place, never to see home again

園.notes: chapter serf in enclosure, devoted solely to tending memorial garden

産.notes: shops marked as pure have a licence to yield/produce

宣.notes: commander undermined by publicised rise of cursed star

辿.notes: a great highway traversing a mountain range

軋.notes: car with tow hook creaks under load

遂.notes: completely achieve horned bull grox, yoked on road

停.notes: Guilliman makes a point of stopping at a culturally significant pavilion

亭.notes: civilian ruler installed at top of domed pavilion that looks like helmet on leaf

遭.meaning: to have a bad experience, あう, 遭う
